process.title: Process & milestones
process.description: We usually partner for eight to ten sessions across three months with optional co-working sprints.

steps.title: Map the hiring landscape
steps.description: We unpack sector norms, sponsorship realities and what evidence UK employers seek.

steps.title: Build your narrative toolkit
steps.description: We co-write scripts, portfolio stories and Q&A to use with recruiters, hiring managers and networks.

steps.title: Sustain the search
steps.description: We monitor energy, iterate weekly plans and celebrate momentum so you do not burn out.

process.note: You can add document reviews or mock interviews between sessions when deadlines appear.

sections.heading: 范畴

sections.heading: 非法律／移民／医疗

sections.heading: 同意与界限

sections.heading: 改期与资料

cases.title: Composite coaching glimpses
cases.description: Examples anonymised across internationally trained professionals navigating the UK market.

items.title: Securing sponsorship with clarity
items.context: A fintech analyst on a Skilled Worker visa was overwhelmed by conflicting sponsorship advice from recruiters.
items.coaching_moves: We mapped visa requirements, scripted boundary-setting emails and built a weekly outreach cadence.
items.shift: They negotiated transparent sponsorship timelines and shortlisted employers aligned with their needs.
items.disclaimer: Composite case blending several clients to protect identities.

items.title: Translating overseas leadership
items.context: A senior project manager from Singapore felt UK interviews discounted their regional achievements.
items.coaching_moves: We co-created UK-relevant impact stories, practised bilingual interviews and rehearsed negotiation scripts.
items.shift: They reported feeling confident presenting cross-market expertise without minimising their background.

items.title: Partner rebuilding identity
items.context: A trailing spouse balancing caregiving and job search needed steady accountability while restarting a career.
items.coaching_moves: We designed micro-experiments, aligned family logistics and used voice-note check-ins during applications.
items.shift: They created a sustainable routine that preserved wellbeing and celebrated incremental wins.
